name: Galactic Rush (yousuf123456)
description:
You are a daring space adventurer, soaring through the vast reaches of the galaxy on a quest to become the greatest pilot of all time.  You must navigate through a dangerous universe filled with deadly monsters and treacherous gravitational forces.

 You'll encounter all manner of dangerous creatures that are intent on destroying you and your mission.  You'll need to use your quick reflexes and piloting skills to evade them and stay on course.

But the real challenge comes from the planets themselves, as each celestial body exerts its own powerful gravitational pull. You'll need to carefully balance your speed and trajectory to avoid being dragged into them.

Do you have what it takes to survive the dangers of the galaxy ? Find out in this thrilling new game!
